summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Conference Management System UI improvements. Backend APIs working excellently (94.1% success rate). Frontend features mostly implemented correctly with some login session issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Some contacts missing address field data
minor_bugs.impact: Address fields may not display for all contacts

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission has session persistence issues
ui_bugs.details: Login works via API but frontend form doesn't maintain session properly

ui_bugs.issue: Category and Exhibit History filter dropdowns not visible in testing
ui_bugs.details: May be due to session issues or data loading

integration_issues.issue: Frontend login form doesn't persist authentication properly
integration_issues.workaround: Direct token setting in localStorage works

passed_tests: User list sorting functionality (name ASC/DESC, email, role)
User actions changed to pencil+trash icons (no dropdown)
Company management API with category and exhibit history filtering
Contact management with address field support
Settings page Company tab with Exhibit History option
Exhibit history categories API (18 options found)
Backend sorting and filtering for all entities
User creation and management with address fields
Frontend Users page display with correct table and actions
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form session persistence issue. The backend APIs are working excellently, but the frontend login form doesn't maintain authentication sessions properly. Users can login via API but the frontend form redirects back to login. Consider checking JWT token storage and retrieval in the frontend authentication flow.
